[华]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ): phonetic 化 + semantic 十 ( “ stalk and leaves ” ) . The top component in 華 / 华 has been simplified to a phonetic element 化 ( huà ) .
This character first appeared in the 1956 Chinese Character Simplification Scheme by the People's Republic of China and is not known to have existed prior to that.
